tasks.title: Keyboard Test
tasks.instructions: Connect a USB keyboard and press any key to know more about your keyboard

tasks.title: Type f and press spacebar
tasks.instructions: Type f and press spacebar. Do this %s times. Target Accuracy 90%%

tasks.title: Type j and press spacebar
tasks.instructions: Type j and press spacebar. Do this %s times. Target Accuracy 90%%

tasks.title: small letters
tasks.instructions: You will be shown some letters.

tasks.title: capital letters
tasks.instructions: You will be shown some capital letters.

tasks.title: months - in order
tasks.instructions: You will be shown the months of the year in the right order.

tasks.title: months - not in order
tasks.instructions: You will be shown the months of the year in random order.

tasks.title: vowels
tasks.instructions: You will be shown the vowels as small letters in random order.

tasks.title: planets - in order
tasks.instructions: You will be shown the names of planets, in order of how far they are from the Sun.

tasks.title: planets - not in order
tasks.instructions: You will be shown the names of planets, in random order.

tasks.title: Tap and swipe
tasks.instructions: You will be shown 2 words. Tap when you see the word tap. Swipe when you see the word swipe.
